You need to know Eval.--Eval Series Part 2--ğŸ” What is Eval, really?Eval (short for evaluation) is how you measure whether your AI is doing what itâ€™s supposed to do inside your product.It moves beyond model accuracy (like precision/recall) to ask:â€œğ˜‹ğ˜°ğ˜¦ğ˜´ ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ ğ˜ˆğ˜ ğ˜¢ğ˜¤ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜¥ğ˜¦ğ˜­ğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ ğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜±ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜¤ğ˜¦ ğ˜°ğ˜³ ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜µğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜®ğ˜¦ ğ˜®ğ˜º ğ˜¶ğ˜´ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜£ğ˜¶ğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¦ğ˜´ğ˜´ ğ˜¯ğ˜¦ğ˜¦ğ˜¥?â€ğŸ“ Eval Methods to Know1.  Offline Eval â€“ Run your AI on static prompts, compare against the expected output2. Human Eval â€“ People rate quality: Is it fluent, helpful, right?3. Behavioral Eval â€“ Throw curveballs: adversarial prompts, edge cases4. Automated Eval â€“ Use AI to judge AI (e.g. LLM-as-a-judge)5. Live/Online Eval â€“ Real user data: click-throughs, dwell time, completionğŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ Why PMs Should Careâ†’Â  It defines what â€œgood enoughâ€ means so youâ€™re not flying blindâ†’Â  It catches model risks early, e.g. drift, bias, hallucinationsâ†’Â  It keeps the team focused on outcomes, not just tech magicIf youâ€™re working with AI, Eval isnâ€™t extra.Just like you wouldnâ€™t ship code without testing, donâ€™t ship AI without eval.ğŸ‘‡ Comment below on the eval you have used hashtag#eval hashtag#aievaluation hashtag#productmanagement hashtag#aiproduct hashtag#aiPM hashtag#aiproductmanagement
